    • Field Detail

      • numberOfMovePoints

        public int numberOfMovePoints
        This number represents at which point in the array of move points a new move point is to be placed. It is extremely important that this value is set to zero before starting to add move points to a new ruleset.

      • maxRules

        public final int maxRules
        A Constant that states the maximum number of sets of movements rules that can be contained by an array of movement point rules for every faction.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • maxMovePoints

        public final int maxMovePoints
        Represents the largest number of movement points that can be contained by a single ruleset of movement points
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • withinBorders

        public final boolean withinBorders(Actor a)
        Returns whether or not the given actor is within the engine specified map borders
        Parameters:
        a - the actor whose presence within borders is being checked
        Returns:
        a boolean value signifying the a's presence
        true if the actor is within borders
        false if the actor is not within borders

      • resetNumPoints

        public void resetNumPoints()
        Resets the number of movement points

      • init

        public abstract void init()

      • drawMap

        public void drawMap(StandardCamera camera)
        Deprecated. 
        Draws every actor that is covered by the passed in camera. Also draws the border and the rune.
        Parameters:
        camera - - The camera that is viewing the objects that are going to be drawn.

      • spawn

        public final void spawn()
        When invoked goes through the list of all Spawn Points contained by this map and makes each one spawn one unit that it was set to spawn.

      • generateBorders

        protected void generateBorders()

      • drawBorder

        protected void drawBorder()

      • initializeSpawnPoints

        protected void initializeSpawnPoints()

      • update

        protected abstract void update()

      • addCreepSpawnPoint

        protected final void addCreepSpawnPoint(Alive.Faction faction,
                                        Location location)
        Creates a new SpawnPoint that will spawn creeps of the passed in faction at the passed in location.
        Parameters:
        faction - The faction of the Creep that this Spawn Point will be spawning
        location - The location of this spawn point and the location where the creeps spawned by this spawn point are to be placed

      • addCreepMovePoint

        protected final void addCreepMovePoint(Alive.Faction faction,
                                       int ruleSet,
                                       Location location)
        Creates a new Location that designates a specific movePoint in a ruleset
        Parameters:
        faction - The faction of the creeps that are to be using this move point
        ruleSet - The set under which this point is to be placed
        location - The location in the "real" world that designates the target that the creeps will be trying to get to
